A frontend application that fetches all dynamic data from backend APIs
A backend application that connects to a PostgreSQL database using specified environment variables
Contest announcement posting functionality with title, description, date, and registration details
Contest results display functionality showing participant rankings and scores
Contest photo gallery showcasing images from various contests
User browsing capability for contest announcements, results, and photos
User registration functionality for signing up to participate in contests
Contest information pages displaying details like rules, prizes, and schedules
Responsive web design with mint cream background and teal colored elements
Database schema supporting contests, participants, results, and photo galleries
API endpoints for fetching contest data, submitting registrations, and retrieving results
User interface for administrators to post new contest announcements
Photo upload and management system for contest images
Registration form capturing user details like name, email, and contest preferences
Package.json configuration with npm run install:all and npm run dev scripts
